body: #cwd:  # Optional  # Specify the working directory in which to execute this task. If left empty, the repository directory will be used.
forceRepoUpdate: $1  # Required  # Selecting this option will force running 'pod repo update' before install.

#projectDirectory:  # Optional  # Optionally specify the path to the root of the project directory. If left empty, the project specified in the Podfile will be used. If no project is specified, then a search for an Xcode project will be made. If more than one Xcode project is found, an error will occur.
CocoaPods.description: Install CocoaPods dependencies for Swift and Objective-C Cocoa projects
